page.title: 17Local employment.
page.content: The local employment has dropped in our area because coal mines have closed down. The people who moved here to work in the coal mines had to look for other jobs when the coal mines shut down. Alot of people now have jobs outside our area but they still live locally. many children in our class have mothers and fathers who work outside our area like Newport, Cardiff, Tredegar, Trelewis etc. Our biggest factories are Penny and Giles, Henlly Forklift and Switchgear only employ some local people. We have some small industrial estates with small factories.
